hostname.description: Hostname that can be used to ssh into SUT without a password as 'ssh hostname'.  Edit ~/.ssh/config for more complicated scenarios.  See man page: ssh_config (5)

tipsy-dir.description: A directory on SUT in which TIPSY is installed

bess-dir.description: A directory on SUT in which bess is installed

t4p4s-dir.description: A directory on SUT in which t4p4s is installed

erfs-dir.description: A directory on SUT in which erfs is installed

uplink-port.description: Port name ('eth1') or pci addr for DPDK ('0000:0b:00.0') or DPDK port number (in case of moongen, e.g., '0') [TODO: we could calculate this from the pci_addr]

downlink-port.description: Port name ('eth1') or pci addr for DPDK ('0000:0b:00.0')  or DPDK port number (in case of moongen, e.g., '0') [TODO: we could calculate this from the pci_addr]

uplink-vpp-interface.description: Uplink VPP Interface name. Required by VPP.

downlink-vpp-interface.description: Downlink VPP Interface name. Required by VPP.

coremask.description: Hexadecimal coremask as string.  Supported by bess, ovs, t4p4s, vpp.  Required by t4p4as.  (This defines the availabilty of the cores.  The actual number of cores is defined by pipeline.core)

portmask.description: Hexadecimal portmask as string.  Supported by t4p4s.  Required by t4p4as.

setup-script.description: Absolute path of the custom SUT setup script

teardown-script.description: Absolute path of the custom SUT teardown script
